arts.ttl: Marco Silva acknowledges the ‘good vibes’ and ‘individual quality’ of Sunderland
arts.sum: If you look at this season, they’ve scored many late goals and set-pieces. [ Sunderland ] have done brilliantly the last few seasons to come from lower divisions up to the Premier League .

arts.ttl: Fulham vs Sunderland – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Fulham welcome high-flying Sunderland to Craven Cottage today, aiming to extend their impressive record against newly promoted sides. In fact, Marco Silva’s team are unbeaten in their last 10 Premier League matches against such opposition. Moreover, they have won the last three of those encounters consecutively. The hosts will rely heavily on their home form. […] The post Fulham vs Sunderland – Predicted lineup and team news first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Sunderland XI vs Fulham – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Sunderland travel to London today, looking to continue their dream return to the Premier League. Régis Le Bris’s side currently sit fourth in the table with 19 points. A win at Craven Cottage would give them their best start after 12 games since the 2005-06 season. The Black Cats have already proven they can handle […] The post Sunderland XI vs Fulham – Predicted lineup and team news first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Fulham vs Sunderland – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: Fulham return to Craven Cottage on Saturday afternoon looking to bounce back from a defeat at Everton. Marco Silva’s side have struggled for consistency, winning just one of their last five matches. However, they face a Sunderland team flying high in fourth place. The Black Cats entered the international break on a massive high after […] The post Fulham vs Sunderland – Match Preview and Team News first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Starting XI: Is this how Sunderland will line up against Fulham?
arts.sum: This afternoon’s game against Fulham comes off the back of a two week international break which thankfully seems to have seen no new injury concerns emerge, plus three games in which we played a slightly different shape to what we had done before. Will Le Bris stick with this new tactical approach? Will last-minute hero […]

arts.ttl: Fulham vs Sunderland Preview: Premier League, 2025/26
arts.sum: The midfielder has been nothing short of superb since his return to the Premier League, as Sunderland fans will hope that he will continue his fine form at Craven Cottage . Now that it has been confirmed that Rodrigo is out for a prolonged amount of time, it is time for Raul Jiménez to step up in his absence and ensure the Cottagers do not continue to descend down the Premier League table.

arts.ttl: Fulham vs. Sunderland injury, suspension list, predicted XIs

Elizabeth is joined by Richard from Wise Men Say to look forward to Saturday's game

arts.ttl: Pre-Match Analysis: Sunderland travel to London to face Fulham
arts.sum: Before that game, they also drew 1-1 with Everton at home and that may have been a performance that disappointed some fans due to the high standards Regis Le Bris and his side have set this season, but they still came from behind to get the result. Marco Silva's side can be dangerous and have the potential to cause problems for the Black Cats but it is also a game that they should go into feeling high on confidence and see it as a chance to get back to winning ways.
